A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I find it funny how these outlets are blaming \"bots\" or \"trolls\" for the bad reviews when I know several people who agree it was not a great movie. They took my childhood hero and turned into a recluse who milks aliens\, whines like a child\, and really doesn't do much in the movie. I get they are moving on from the Skywalker era\, but don't with some respect for the fans of those characters and the characters themselves.
